languages.text: {n}Часть гладиаторов выглядит смущенной, другие вздыхают с облегчением. Из задних рядов слышится ворчание:{/n} "Ну наконец-то у нас вменяем{mf|ый|ая} главн{mf|ый|ая}. Заколебал меня этот бред от Злобы, которым он новичкам мозги полоскал".

{n}Some of the gladiators look confused, while others sigh in relief. You hear someone grumble in the back,{/n} "Finally, a boss who's right in the head. I was so sick of Malice mucking up the brains of fresh meat with his crap."
languages.original_text: {n}Часть гладиаторов выглядит смущенной, другие вздыхают с облегчением. Из задних рядов слышится ворчание:{/n} "Ну наконец-то у нас вменяем{mf|ый|ая} главн{mf|ый|ая}. Заколебал меня этот бред от Злобы, которым он новичкам мозги полоскал".

traits.locale_text: {n}Some of the gladiators look confused, others sigh in relief. You hear someone grumble in the back,{/n} "Finally, a boss who's right in the head. I was so sick of Malice mucking up the brains of fresh meat with his crap."
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

languages.text: {n}困惑した表情を浮かべる剣闘士もいれば、安堵のため息をつく剣闘士もいる。奥で誰かが不平を言うのが聞こえる。{/n}「やっと、まともなボスが現れた。マリスのくだらない趣味で新入りの脳みそをぐちゃぐちゃにするのは、もうウンザリだった」
languages.original_text: {n}Some of the gladiators look confused, while others sigh in relief. You hear someone grumble in the back,{/n} "Finally, a boss who's right in the head. I was so sick of Malice mucking up the brains of fresh meat with his crap."

traits.locale_text: {n}困惑した表情を浮かべる剣闘士もいれば、安堵のため息をつく剣闘士もいる。奥で誰かが不平を言うのが聞こえる。{/n}「やっと、まともなボスが現れた。マリスのくだらない趣味で新入りの脳みそをぐちゃぐちゃにするのは、もうウンザリだった」
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

languages.text: {n}一部分角斗士看起来很困惑，而另一部分则松了一口气。你听到后面有人嘟囔着。{/n}“终于有个脑子清醒的老大了。那个恶棍一直在胡说八道，我已经受够他那堆屁话了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Some of the gladiators look confused, while others sigh in relief. You hear someone grumble in the back,{/n} "Finally, a boss who's right in the head. I was so sick of Malice mucking up the brains of fresh meat with his crap."

traits.locale_text: {n}一部分角斗士看起来很困惑，而另一部分则松了一口气。你听到后面有人嘟囔着。{/n}“终于有个脑子清醒的老大了。那个恶棍一直在胡说八道，我已经受够他那堆屁话了。”
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

languages.text: {n}Algunos gladiadores parecen confusos, mientras que otros suspiran aliviados. Se oye a alguien refunfuñar al fondo.{/n} «Por fin nos manda alguien que está bien de la cabeza. Estaba harto de que Malicia les comiera el coco a los nuevos con sus milongas».
languages.original_text: {n}Some of the gladiators look confused, while others sigh in relief. You hear someone grumble in the back,{/n} "Finally, a boss who's right in the head. I was so sick of Malice mucking up the brains of fresh meat with his crap."

traits.locale_text: {n}Algunos gladiadores parecen confusos, mientras que otros suspiran aliviados. Se oye a alguien refunfuñar al fondo.{/n} «Por fin nos manda alguien que está bien de la cabeza. Estaba harto de que Malicia les comiera el coco a los nuevos con sus milongas».
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

languages.text: {n}Manche der Gladiatoren sehen verwirrt aus, andere seufzen erleichtert auf. Du hörst in einer der hinteren Reihen jemanden murmeln:{/n} "Endlich ein Boss, der richtig im Kopf ist. Ich hatte es so leid, dass Tücke dem Frischfleisch immer seinen Scheiß aufgetischt hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Some of the gladiators look confused, while others sigh in relief. You hear someone grumble in the back,{/n} "Finally, a boss who's right in the head. I was so sick of Malice mucking up the brains of fresh meat with his crap."

traits.locale_text: {n}Manche der Gladiatoren sehen verwirrt aus, andere seufzen erleichtert auf. Du hörst in einer der hinteren Reihen jemanden murmeln:{/n} "Endlich ein Boss, der richtig im Kopf ist. Ich hatte es so leid, dass Tücke dem Frischfleisch immer seinen Scheiß aufgetischt hat."
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

languages.text: {n}Les gladiateurs semblent partagés entre soulagement et confusion. Vous entendez quelqu'un marmonner dans le fond :{/n} « Enfin un chef qu'a toute sa tête. J'en avais marre d'entendre Malice raconter que de la merde aux petits nouveaux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Some of the gladiators look confused, while others sigh in relief. You hear someone grumble in the back,{/n} "Finally, a boss who's right in the head. I was so sick of Malice mucking up the brains of fresh meat with his crap."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les gladiateurs semblent partagés entre soulagement et confusion. Vous entendez quelqu'un marmonner dans le fond :{/n} « Enfin un chef qu'a toute sa tête. J'en avais marre d'entendre Malice raconter que de la merde aux petits nouveaux. »
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

languages.text: {n}Gladyatörlerden bazılarının kafası karışmış, ötekileri ise rahat bir nefes alıyor. Arkalardan birilerinin homurdandığını duyuyorsun.{/n} "Nihayet kafası çalışan bir patron bulduk. Melanet'in, zırvalarıyla taze etlerin kafasını ütülemesinden bıkmıştım."
languages.original_text: {n}Some of the gladiators look confused, while others sigh in relief. You hear someone grumble in the back,{/n} "Finally, a boss who's right in the head. I was so sick of Malice mucking up the brains of fresh meat with his crap."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gladyatörlerden bazılarının kafası karışmış, ötekileri ise rahat bir nefes alıyor. Arkalardan birilerinin homurdanmasını duyuyorsun.{/n} "Nihayet kafası çalışan bir patron bulduk. Melanet'in zırvalarıyla yeni gelen herkesin kafasını piç etmesinden bıkmıştım."
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator
